Sentencas: Various trivalent oxides were added as co-dopants to gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) electrolyte used for solid oxide fuel cells at up to 5 mol%.
Titulo: Effect of co-dopant addition on properties of gadolinia-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: An examination was made on how they affect the electrical conductivity of the electrolyte and, eventually, the open-circuit voltage (OCV) of a unit cell.
Titulo: Effect of co-dopant addition on properties of gadolinia-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Through a comparison of the thermal expansion coefficients (TEC), it was investigated whether or not the co-doped electrolytes are thermomechanically compatible with other cell components.
Titulo: Effect of co-dopant addition on properties of gadolinia-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The addition of co-dopants generally improve the electrical properties of the electrolyte by yielding greater OCV values and not changing the TEC significantly (5% at most), except in the case of Pr.
Titulo: Effect of co-dopant addition on properties of gadolinia-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Among the electrolytes examined, the one co-doped with Sm (3 mol%) shows the best improvement in performance.
Titulo: Effect of co-dopant addition on properties of gadolinia-doped ceria electrolyte
